item.description:
The theme for this group is promoting your local business using the latest and greatest tools the Internet has to offer, and there is a lot of ground to cover. The tools at your disposal are inexpensive (or free) and in the long run, far more effective then advertising outlets traditionally available to local small businesses. The problem is, very few know what, where and why? Together, we can change that.

In the files section (take a look at the blue menu links on the left) you can find a presentation that I used for our first meetup. The homework assignment was to take a look at the different tools we talked about (plus your own) and come up with a plan of action for 2009.

The agenda:
- discuss individual business goals for 2009
- your Web strategy for 2009
- your expectations and how this group can help
- align group goals for 2009 with above
item.how_to_find_us: It should be easy - we are in the "Watertown Savings Bank" room
item.name: Greater Boston Area - Small Business Support Network January Meetup
